bow: rant the circumcision decision do know if this is the right place to put this if it not let me know and can take it down tried posting in babybumps but guess this topic is not allowed really just need to vent so sorry this is going to be long my mom has been my rock since was kid she has made her fair share of mistakes like everyone but has always done great job at fostering honest and open conversation with me and we almost always come to happy understanding at the end of discussion or disagreement because of that really kind of reeling from our latest conversation my mom knows that we re having boy and has been possibly even more ecstatic than we are about this very very wanted and anticipated child she known that we were seriously considering not circumcising for quite some time now at this point we are actually 100 sure that we are not going to circumcise but now that we re nearing our due date august 29th ve been fielding questions from family mainly because they want to know if we re having bris my side is jewish although in no way religious and she been dancing around the subject more and more it finally came to head yesterday when she brought it up again and essentially told me that she thinks that we re making really big mistake like to the point that our son will live more difficult life because of it stayed calm since really did want to get into fight about it and we ended the call on relatively good note we spoke again today and although she says that she will love my son no matter what which completely believe she reiterated that she thinks we re making huge mistake specifically that we ll make his life more difficult because of bullying later in life in sexual encounters and even just going to pee at urinal she also said that she thinks that we re putting an undue burden on him that we wo have to deal with but he will for the rest of his life and that we re taking the easy way out by choosing to not make decision about what to do she also stated that she thinks that my husband and are trying to be rebellious against religion she is in no way religious person either and that we re being immature the worst part though was when she said that was putting burden on him the way see it we re giving our son the chance to have an intact body the way that nature intended although there no medical reason not to do it other than the typical risks of surgery that come with every minor procedure there is also no good reason to do it unless there an issue later in life such as phimosis which would be known about until later in life and is relatively rare feel like we re making an informed decision and one that really is pertinent to anyone other than myself my husband and most importantly my son am being terrible mother already am making the wrong decision for the wrong reasons am being selfish have had huge emotional breakdown once during this pregnancy and yet this sent me over the edge bawled after got off the phone told her how hurt was by what she said and she said that had told her to be honest had told her to be honest but this just felt cruel honestly do understand why she thinks that this is such huge mistake and other than saying that she thinks that he ll be ridiculed for his penis ca figure out why she feels this strongly about such relatively benign subject ugh this got so long just am so upset over this and do know what to think if you ve read this far thank you and if you ve got any insight be happy to hear it of course it does make you terrible mother look it seems like you made your decision for good reasons and that great that you guys are actually trying to find out by yourselves what best for your baby instead of just doing what people tell you to think this is part of becoming parent you ll have to make decisions for your kid and lot of people will at least question those when not telling you what to do so be prepared to stand up for yourself it looks like you re on the right track tho and about circumcision european come from country where it is not the norm at all to have boys circumcised and do think it makes all of us bad parents plus if your son really wants to do it later in life it sounds like you be open to let him have the procedure done so it will be up to him which is awesome the way see it you re just giving your baby the possibility to make this choice over his body once he older you re already considering him as person on his own which is great story time when told my not circumcised male obviously european friends that was maybe considering circumcision
